Package elki.database.query.distance

Class SpatialPrimitiveDistanceSimilarityQuery<O extends SpatialComparable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • elki.database.query.distance.PrimitiveDistanceQuery<V>
      • elki.database.query.distance.SpatialPrimitiveDistanceQuery<O>
        • elki.database.query.distance.SpatialPrimitiveDistanceSimilarityQuery<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - Object type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DistanceQuery<O>, SpatialDistanceQuery<O>, DistanceSimilarityQuery<O>, SimilarityQuery<O>
    public class SpatialPrimitiveDistanceSimilarityQuery<O extends SpatialComparable>
extends SpatialPrimitiveDistanceQuery<O>
implements DistanceSimilarityQuery<O>
    Combination query class, to allow combined implementations of spatial distances and similarities.
    Since:
    0.7.5
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
